name: Robbie Robot
description:
Robbie Robot the 3D Platformer game for my class

Robbie has been ordered to pick up all of the crystals throughout the 3 spaces in this world.

Touch the floor on the robot room and lose points.

I have made multiple changes to the design

  • I changed the music and effect sounds for the whole game
  • I added 2 more levels:
    • Second level is in the Robot Room with platforms to have the payer avoid the floor 
    • Third level is the boss in a cave room
  • I created the Boss for level 3
  • I created the crystals for the pickups
